name: Yet Another Tuesday
description:
Tuesdays are the worst! The weekend already feels like a distant memory, and you're not even to the midway point of the workweek. But what if you could sneak out of work for the day? All you would have to do is get by a few of your co-workers without drawing their attention. What could go wrong? 

  • Leave  work early through 10 different aisles, each with its own unique challenges.
  • Once you've made it out, decide how you should spend your day off.
  • Try to unlock the mystery of what could be hidden in Aisle 0, the aisle that always seems to be blocked off.
